description: Defines workflow states and rules for a document.

fields.description: DocType on which this Workflow is applicable.
fields.label: Document Type

fields.description: If checked, all other workflows become inactive.
fields.label: Is Active

fields.description: Different "States" this document can exist in. Like "Open", "Pending Approval" etc.
fields.label: States

fields.description:
All possible Workflow States and roles of the workflow. 
Docstatus Options: 0 is"Saved", 1 is "Submitted" and 2 is "Cancelled"
fields.label: Document States

fields.description: Rules for how states are transitions, like next state and which role is allowed to change state etc.
fields.label: Transition Rules

fields.description: Rules defining transition of state in the workflow.
fields.label: Transitions

fields.description: Field that represents the Workflow State of the transaction (if field is not present, a new hidden Custom Field will be created)
fields.label: Workflow State Field

name: Workflow
